name: PENALTY-a schoolgirl in distress
description:
After school a little schoolgirl was captured and locked in an abandoned classroom, now it's your duty to help her escape before her kidnappers return, but beware that there are many enemies.

A short game but with several endings to motivate you to find different ways to escape from the place.

game created to participate in 20 Second Game Jam and have some fun, it's not a big deal but it really helped me to understand a few things quickly, so I hope you enjoy this little game and stuff.
